solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    int result = 0;--newline--    --newline--    public int findTilt(TreeNode root) {--newline--        postOrder(root);--newline--        return result;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--    private int postOrder(TreeNode root) {--newline--        if (root == null) return 0;--newline--        --newline--        int left = postOrder(root.left);--newline--        int right = postOrder(root.right);--newline--        --newline--        result += Math.abs(left - right);--newline--        --newline--        return left + right + root.val;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
